Cleric main casting stat is WIS but concentration checks use CON. So you want those at 16 in character creation and get WIS to 20 as you progress through the game. 

INT is your dump stat so 8 is fine. If she is not your avatar/party face CHA 8 is also fine. 

Trickery Domain is one of the weaker cleric subclasses so if you decide to change her subclass to one that gives her heavy armor proficiency you can drop DEX to 10 and take the Alert feat.
DEX however also affects initiative so 14 DEX is always good even with heavy armor.

A lot about how to play clerics comes down to spell usage. Although they can excel at any role if built correctly, they are often intended to be support. Great Spells to use early game are sanctuary, create water and bless to name a few.

Note that cantrips gained from race use INT as their casting stat.

Early on your spell save DC is also fairly low. So it’s better to avoid save–or–suck spells that require enemies to fail a saving throw until you can increase your spell save DC.
